roleset.name: protect from heat, cold, etc

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Polyurethane foam is a highly efficient insulator , which [*T*-2] accounts for why the walls of refrigerators and freezers can be thinner now than they were [*?*] back in the days when they-1 were insulated [*-1] with glass fiber [*T*-3] [*T*-4] .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Separately , [the company 's board]-1 adopted a proposal [*] to amend its 1986 shareholder rights plan , [*-1] further insulating the company from takeover .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'insulate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus; adjectival 'insulated' based on BOLT-6. Comparison with 'protect'.Member of VNcls butter-9.9.

example.name: adjectival rel: insulated
example.text: Northern Wisconsin looks to be the most succeptible to the change , while Lake Michigan regions will be more insulated from the changes .

example.name: passive
example.text: `` [People in this business]-1 have been insulated [*-1] , '' says [*T*-2] Josh Pons , a horse breeder from Bel Air , Md .
